title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with product management, shopping cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard. Built with modern technologies for optimal performance and user experience.
longDescription: Comprehensive e-commerce solution featuring user authentication, product catalog with advanced filtering, shopping cart functionality, secure payment processing via Stripe, order management, and a powerful admin dashboard for inventory and sales tracking.

title: Task Management Dashboard
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and project tracking capabilities.
longDescription: Feature-rich task management system with drag-and-drop functionality, real-time collaboration, project timelines, team member assignments, file attachments, and comprehensive reporting tools.

title: Network Anomaly Detector
description: A SaaS platform that allows users to create professional portfolio websites without coding knowledge, featuring customizable templates and drag-and-drop editing.
longDescription: Advanced network monitoring system that detects unusual patterns and potential security threats in real-time network traffic using machine learning algorithms.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: A beautiful weather application with real-time weather data, 7-day forecasts, and location-based weather alerts.
longDescription: Modern weather application featuring current weather conditions, hourly and weekly forecasts, weather maps, severe weather alerts, and location search with autocomplete.

title: Blog Platform with CMS
description: A modern blogging platform with a headless CMS, markdown support, and SEO optimization features.
longDescription: Full-featured blogging platform with markdown editor, image optimization, tag system, comment functionality, RSS feeds, and comprehensive SEO tools.

title: Real-Time Chat Application
description: A real-time messaging application with group chats, file sharing, and end-to-end encryption.
longDescription: Secure messaging platform featuring one-on-one and group chats, file sharing, emoji reactions, typing indicators, read receipts, and message search functionality.
